summary.para: Contains classes that implement reporting functionality in Blazor applications.
Contains settings for the Blazor Reporting client-side controls.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.ClientSideModelSettingsBase.IncludeCldrData

summary.para: Specifies whether to load CLDR JSON data for the current locale.

member.value: True, to include CLDR JSON data; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.ClientSideModelSettingsBase.IncludeCldrSupplemental

summary.para: Specifies whether to load the CLDR supplemental data.

member.value: True, to include CLDR supplemental data; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.ClientSideModelSettingsBase.IncludeLocalization

summary.para: Specifies whether to load a localization script.

member.value: True, to include a localization script; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.
A control that displays an interactive preview of a document generated from a report and allows the user to view, print and export the report document in Blazor apps.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.AccessibilityCompliant

summary.para: Enables accessibility mode.

member.value: True to enable accessibility mode; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.CloseAsync

summary.para: Asynchronously finishes the Document Viewer operation.

member.returns: The task object that is the asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.Height

summary.para: Gets or sets the Document Viewer’s height on a page.

member.value: A string that specifies the control’s height on a page. The default value is ‘700px’.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.MobileMode

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to configure the Document Viewer for mobile devices.

member.value: True to configure the Document Viewer for mobile devices; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.OpenReport(System.String)

summary.para: Opens the specified report on the Web Document Viewer’s client side. Allows you to refresh a preview for the loaded report.

member.param: A string that specifies the report’s URL.
member.returns: A Task that is completed when the report is opened.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.ReportName

summary.para: Gets or sets a string that specifies the unique report name.

member.value: A string that identifies a report.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.ResetParameters

summary.para: Resets the report parameter values to the default values.

member.returns: A Task that is completed when the parameters are reset.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.RightToLeft

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable a right-to-left layout in the Document Viewer’s UI.

member.value: True to enable the RTL layout; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.SetCurrentDocumentId(System.String)

summary.para: Specifies an identifier for the current document. For internal use.

member.param: A string that is the document identifier.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.SetCurrentReportId(System.String)

summary.para: Specifies an identifier for the current report. For internal use.

member.param: A string that is the report identifier.

Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the BeforeRender client-side event that allows you to perform any action before the Web Document Viewer is rendered.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the BeforeRender event.

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the CustomizeElements client-side event that allows you to customize the Web Document Viewer UI elements.

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the CustomizeParameterEditors client-side event that allows you to specify the parameter editor for the report parameter.

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the CustomizeParameterLookUpSource client-side event that allows you to specify look-up values for the parameter editor.

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the DocumentReady client-side event that occurs before the Document Viewer loads a document.

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the EditingFieldChanged client-side event that allows you to respond to a field value change.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.OnExport

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the OnExport client-side event that allows you to pass data to the server before the requests to print the document or to get the exported document are executed.

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the OnServerError client-side event that allows you to perform actions when an Ajax request has an error.

member.value: true, to print and export documents in the tab that contains the Document Viewer; false to open another browser tab for print and export.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.StartupExtensions.UseDevExpressBlazorReporting(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)

summary.para: Registers the DevExpress Blazor Reporting middleware.

member.param: An object that provides the mechanisms to configure an application’s request pipeline.
member.returns: An object that provides the mechanisms to configure an application’s request pipeline for subsequent use.

summary.para: Lists values that specify the tab panel position in the Document Viewer.
The tab panel is at the left side of the Document Viewer.
The tab panel is at the right side of the Document Viewer.
